targets.target:
SELECT sensor_number, sensor_value, timestamp
FROM sensor_moisture
WHERE sensor_number = 1 AND board_uuid = '$board_uuid'
ORDER BY timestamp DESC 
ALLOW FILTERING;

SELECT sensor_number, sensor_value, timestamp
FROM sensor_moisture
WHERE sensor_number = 2 AND board_uuid = '$board_uuid'
ORDER BY timestamp DESC 
ALLOW FILTERING;

SELECT sensor_number, sensor_value, timestamp
FROM sensor_moisture
WHERE sensor_number = 3 AND board_uuid = '$board_uuid'
ORDER BY timestamp DESC 
ALLOW FILTERING;

SELECT sensor_number, sensor_value, timestamp
FROM sensor_humidity
WHERE sensor_number = 1 AND board_uuid = '$board_uuid'
ORDER BY timestamp DESC 
ALLOW FILTERING;

SELECT sensor_number, sensor_value, timestamp
FROM sensor_temperature
WHERE sensor_number = 1 AND board_uuid = '$board_uuid'
ORDER BY timestamp DESC 
ALLOW FILTERING;

SELECT sensor_number, sensor_value, timestamp
FROM sensor_pressure
WHERE sensor_number = 1 AND board_uuid = '$board_uuid'
ORDER BY timestamp DESC 
ALLOW FILTERING;

SELECT blobAsText(textAsBlob('Mean')), CAST(mean_value as double) as mean, toTimestamp(date) as time
FROM sensor_statistics
WHERE sensor_number = 1 AND board_uuid = '$board_uuid' AND sensor_type = 'moisture'
ALLOW FILTERING;

SELECT blobAsText(textAsBlob('Median')), CAST(median_value as double) as mean, toTimestamp(date) as time
FROM sensor_statistics
WHERE sensor_number = 1 AND board_uuid = '$board_uuid' AND sensor_type = 'moisture'
ALLOW FILTERING;

SELECT blobAsText(textAsBlob('Min')), CAST(min_value as double) as mean, toTimestamp(date) as time
FROM sensor_statistics
WHERE sensor_number = 1 AND board_uuid = '$board_uuid' AND sensor_type = 'moisture'
ALLOW FILTERING;

SELECT blobAsText(textAsBlob('Max')), CAST(max_value as double) as mean, toTimestamp(date) as time
FROM sensor_statistics
WHERE sensor_number = 1 AND board_uuid = '$board_uuid' AND sensor_type = 'moisture'
ALLOW FILTERING;
